entries.description: Amazon Q: Now the Amazon Q suggestions can co-exist with Jetbrains suggestions, with tab behavior configurable in the settings.
Amazon Q: Amazon Q inline now has configurable shortcuts for various actions including accept and browsing through suggestions.
Add setting to allow Q /dev to run code and test commands
Amazon Q: The suggestion popup will hide by default and will be displayed when the suggestion is being hovered over.
Amazon Q /doc: fix open diff in a tab when another modal is open
Amazon Q /test: Fixed an issue which incorrectly caused payload size exceeded exception when collecting project payload files
fix(amazonq): For security reasons, disabled auto linkify for link texts coming in markdown other than [TEXT](URL) format
Fix UI freeze caused by updating workspace index on non background context
